theme.label: Theme
theme.description: Choose the theme of the launcher.

launcherStyle.label: Launcher Style
launcherStyle.description:
Choose the style of the launcher.
Standard style offers a modern look with multiple theme options, while Classic style provides a blocky Minecraft-inspired design.

language.label: Language
language.description: Select the language for the launcher.

startup.label: Startup
startup.autoStartDescription: Automatically launch the app when the system starts.
startup.minimizeToTrayDescription: Start the app minimized to the system tray.

game.showSnapshotsDescription: Show snapshot (beta/experimental) versions of Minecraft in the launcher.

performance.label: Performance
performance.ramAllocationDescription: Set the amount of RAM allocated to the game. Minimum recommended Ram is at least 2GB for slow machines.

runtime.label: Runtime
runtime.javaPathDescription: Specify the path to the Java executable.
runtime.gameArgsDescription: Specify game arguments to launch the game (advanced users only).
runtime.jvmArgumentsDescription: Set additional JVM arguments for advanced performance tuning.
runtime.environmentVariablesDescription: Set environment variables for the runtime process.
runtime.runDetachedDescription: Run the game in detached mode, allowing the launcher to close while the game is still running.
runtime.verifyGameFilesDescription: Verify game files integrity before launching.
runtime.verifyGameFilesWarning: Warning: Enabling this option may increase launch time significantly and will delete all previous game progress.
runtime.intelEnabledMacDescription: Enable Intel graphics acceleration on macOS machines.
runtime.runAsAdminDescription: Launch the game with administrator privileges.
runtime.ignoredDescription: Specify files or directories to ignore when verifying game files.

display.label: Display
display.resolutionDescription: Set the resolution of the game window.

launcher.checkForUpdatesDescription: Check for new launcher updates on startup.

integration.label: Integration
integration.discordRPCDescription: Enable or disable Discord Rich Presence integration.

notification.label: Notifications
notification.playSoundDescription: Play a sound when notifications appear.

categories.label: Notification Categories
categories.description: Choose which types of notifications to show.

storage.launcherFolderDescription: The directory where launcher is installed.
storage.minecraftFolderDescription: The directory where Minecraft is installed.
storage.modFolderDescription: The directory where mods are installed.

about.developedBy: Developed and crafted with üíñ by Cosmic & Olly
about.specialThanks: Special thanks to all contributors and testers.
about.extraOpenSourceLibrariesDescription: Other open source libraries used in this project.
about.donateDescription: If you like this project, consider buying me a coffee to support development!
about.disclaimerDescription: This launcher is an independent project and is not affiliated with Mojang, Microsoft, or any official Minecraft entity. All trademarks and copyrights belong to their respective owners.

invoker.description: Please wait while the process completes.
invoker.closeNote: You can close the active window to stop this process

launchStatus.launchFailed: Launch failed, please try again later!

accountAdder.addMinecraftAccountDescription: Add your official Minecraft account to play online. (Requires a valid Mojang or Microsoft account.)
accountAdder.addOfflineAccountDescription: Play on unofficial or cracked servers without a Minecraft account. (Progress and skins will not sync across devices.)

offlineAccountForm.enterUsername: Enter a username to create an offline Minecraft account. This account will only work on unofficial servers.
offlineAccountForm.usernameTooShort: Username must be at least 3 characters long
offlineAccountForm.usernameTooLong: Username must be 16 characters or less
offlineAccountForm.usernameInvalidCharacters: Username can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores

accountAdder.failedToAddAccount: Failed to add account. Please try again.

titles.gameRunning: A another instance is already running.

messages.deleteAccount: Are you sure you want to remove this account?
messages.apiError: An error occurred while connecting to the API. Please try again later.
messages.apiUnreachable: The API server is unreachable. Please check your internet connection and try again.
messages.gamePreparingCancelMessage: An instance is currently being prepared for launch. You must cancel the current launch process before selecting a different instance. Would you like to cancel the launch?
messages.gameRunningCancelMessage: An instance is currently running. You must close the game before selecting a different instance. Would you like to close the game?

splash.description: Please wait while the process completes.
splash.closeNote: You can close the active window to stop this process

toast.launchError: Something went wrong while launching the game. Please try again later.

accountManager.title: Account Manager
accountManager.description: Manage your Minecraft accounts here. Switch between profiles and remove accounts to personalize your play experience.
accountManager.deleteAccountMessage: Are you sure you want to remove this account?

versionSelector.versionSummary: Select your preferred Minecraft version and variant.

console.description: This console will display launcher activities and game logs

instanceManager.title: Instance Manager
instanceManager.description: Manage your Minecraft instances here. Create, edit, and delete instances to personalize your play experience.
instanceManager.instanceNameTooShort: Instance name must be at least 3 characters long
instanceManager.instanceNameTooLong: Instance name must be 16 characters or less
instanceManager.instanceNameInvalidCharacters: Instance name can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores

version.label: Available version
version.description: Select the version of Minecraft to use for this instance.

vanilla.name: Vanilla
vanilla.description: Experience vanilla Minecraft with enhanced performance, improved gameplay mechanics, and exciting new features. Play the pure, unmodified version of the game as intended by Mojang.

forge.name: Forge
forge.description: Play with Forge mods for enhanced gameplay, new items, blocks, and mechanics. Access thousands of community-created modifications to transform your Minecraft experience.

fabric.name: Fabric
fabric.description: Experience lightweight and fast modding with Fabric. Enjoy performance optimizations, modern mods, and quick updates to the latest Minecraft versions.

apiFetch.wakeup1: Poking the server with a stick to wake it up...
apiFetch.wakeup2: Politely asking the server to rise and shine...
apiFetch.wakeup3: Bribing the server with virtual coffee...
apiFetch.wakeup4: Sending a wake-up call to the server...
apiFetch.wakeup7: Playing loud music to get the server moving...

debugger.eventSetupComplete: [MAIN CONTENT] Event setup complete. Total cleanup functions

logs.apiUnreachable: API unreachable. Some features might not work properly.

notifications.launchFailedMessage: Failed to start Minecraft, please try again later.
notifications.connectionRestoredMessage: Connection restored. You can now play Minecraft again.
notifications.launcherRestartRequiredMessage: A restart of the launcher is required for the changes to take effect.

errors.memoryConfiguration: Minimum memory must be less than maximum memory
errors.accountRefreshFailed: Failed to refresh account after retry
